hero.title: Your Local Friend in Every City
hero.subtitle: Connect with authentic locals who'll show you their city like a true friend would. No tours, no scripts - just genuine experiences.

step1.title: Choose Your City
step1.description: Browse verified local buddies in your destination. Each buddy is background-checked and speaks your language.

step2.title: Book & Connect
step2.description: Book your buddy by the hour. Chat beforehand to plan what you'd like to see and do.

step3.title: Explore Like a Local
step3.description: Meet your buddy and explore the city together. Discover hidden gems, local favorites, and make a real connection.

verified.title: Verified Locals
verified.description: Every buddy is identity-verified and background-checked for your safety and peace of mind.

authentic.title: Authentic Experiences
authentic.description: No scripted tours. Your buddy tailors the time to your interests and shows you their personal favorites.

safe.title: Safe & Secure
safe.description: Secure payments, emergency contacts, and real-time location sharing keep you safe.

pricing.title: Fair Pricing
pricing.description: Starting from just $20 per hour. No hidden fees, no tourist traps - just honest local guidance.
